runs.comm: tossed up outside off, firm punch to mid off
dragged down, mistimed pull to square leg, missed out really
back and punching an off stump ball to cover
back again, late cutting from off stump to backward point
back once more, cut hard but Charles dives a cover point and saves four, fine save, good work

back and it skips past the cut stroke and narrowly avoids off stump, Ramdin had the bails off and they're going the check for the stumping, surely Warner didn't leave his ground here...oh it's not for the stumping it's bowled him! Who would have thought that, it nicked the off stump on the way through to the keeper and has bowled Warner. What a blow for West Indies, another great start from Badree
swept hard from outside off, fielded well by deep midwicket running round, collects on the second bounce
fired wide of off stump, left alone
back of a length again, this time cut to backward point
lifted up and over mid off, nice stroke that from a full length on off stump, struck well
goes to square drive outside off and gets a bottom edge into the turf
skips through quicker and beats Hussey's push forward, close to off stump again
this time gets the square drive away, past point, not timed well enough to get four
quite flat outside off, chopped away behind square on the off side, this is timed well and away for four
four more, behind square on the leg side this time, full on leg stump and flicked away using the pace, nicely played
outside off, driven again, this time only finds cover point
pushed into the off side again, only finds extra cover
leg stump again, flicked into the on-side, two as midwicket has to chase round quite a distance
driven hard again, well timed again, mid off just gets round and saves four

oh swept straight up in the air and taken by the bowler in typically nonplussed fashion. Kicks the ball away, is that how one celebrates getting rid of Hussey in a semi-final? It is if you're Marlon Samuels. It was just outside off and Hussey swung hard at it aiming over the leg side but got it off a huge top edge and it went nowhere
bit of turn here, played off the hip towards short long leg from a length
awkward push forward on off stump, gets it off an outside edge into the off side, tentative
dropped into midwicket off a length
outside off, goes to sweep and misses completely, god job it was wide
step back to cut and slaps it past extra cover, super timing, it was just fractionally short and Watson was on to it in a flash
leg stump and full, played into the on side for just a single
steps back quickly to pull hard but misses, skipped on a touched quicker

goes for the shame stroke, again it skips on but this is straight and out goes leg stump. Right call to keep Badree going because he's slid one past the big man. That is a massive, massive blow. It was dragged down but skidded on to Watson and he was too late with the stroke
first ball tries to pull, it's nowhere near short enough to pull and goes under the stroke and thankfully for the batsman past off stump
forward and blocking into the leg side
back and played into the leg side for a single past point
played from off stump towards long on, good running produces the error from the fielder and they take two
waited for and late cut into the covers
forward this time playing towards point, no run
goes to late cut again but it turns in from outside off, cramps him up and he keeps it out on the crease
tossed up outside off, slugged down the ground and over mid off, good strike
four more down the ground, stepping back and slapping it past the bowler, a straight pull almost past mid off, another excellent strike

full and sliding now leg, Ramdin takes it and goes up for a huge appeal and up goes the finger! Rampaul strikes first ball with a strangle down the leg side, complete luck that is, White went to flick it to leg and must have got a thin touch on it, Ramdin was convinced and so was the umpire
bumper, well directed, a goodun, swing and a miss

short ball into the body, the batsman gets into a total tangle and chips a catch back to the bowler. A disgusting dismissal. Got into a complete mess trying to defend it back to the bowler or turn it to leg, in the end, stood squared up and turned the face, it looped off a leading edge providing a simple chance to Rampaul who ran forward three yards to take it
bumper again, too high this time
back of a length outside off, punched to cover point
played towards the same fielder, this time wide enough for a single
forward on off stump, played towards cover

swept at and a top edge to short long leg. He had trouble against Narine in the Windies did Wade and he's lasted two balls here. Goes to sweep just outside leg stump and gets a top edge that flies straight to the fielder on the 45, simple catch
Bailey has a swing here, pulling and gets it past square leg to the rope, powerfully struck
forward on off stump, played back towards the bowler
back to dab it away and misses outside off
back again, this time across the stumps to flick to leg, two runs out towards deep midwicket
forward and flicked out through square leg
fuller and pushed down to long on
back of a length, guided down to third man
angled in, went to play to leg, inside edge off the pads behind square on the off side
banged in, played very awkwardly, nearly like David Hussey chips a catch back to the bowler, came of a leading edge
banged in again, cut at and missed outside off
outside off, pushed towards cover point
outside off, skids on and Cummins misses with a back foot drive aimed at extra cover
full on the leg stump, strikes the pad, runs into the covers, was going down
ah lovely, go on the skipper...slog swept over midwicket, picked up fabulously into the terraces
shorter outside off, slapped down to long off where there's a fumble and they can get back for two
quicker ball, back of a length, clipped to long on
another lovely strike from the skipper...where has this boy been...smashed a full ball just outside off over long off, lovely timing
and again, this time wide of long off and one bounce for four, timed again, very nice
goes again, gets it off the toe though and this should be easily caught but no! The fielder slips and lets it through his hands for four! Whoops
smash! Gone again, clear the front leg and wallop it into the stands, timed superbly again, three out of four timed to perfection this over
short this time, that's well timed too, only a single though, finds the fielder at deep square, that should have gone again
full and too full, flicked away fine, no long leg, that's four more
outside off, goes across his stumps and works it into midwicket
straighter and worked to short long leg around the corner
back of a length again, swept down to deep square leg
too straight this, comes off the pad down the leg side, a couple with hard running
nicely played, dropped past slip from a length outside off, well played
that was the other one and beats the forward lunge, totally done, beautifully bowled
length on middle and leg, Bailey is down to paddle it and doesn't quite get it past the deep fielder
nice shot, timed down the ground for a quick single
swung over midwicket, another big strike from Bailey, taken off a length and gets it just over the fielder right on the rope, again cleared the front leg and swung hard
slower ball, full, ran down to long on
slower ball again, ran back to the bowler
slower ball again, nice and full, waited for and dabbed into square leg
step to leg, goes to swing down the ground, gets a top edge over the keeper, four to the backstop

another step to leg and goes for the leg side fence taking on the deep fielder but this time picks him out. That's a very brave effort from Bailey but this time he doesn't quite time it and the man on the rope doesn't have to move to take the catch

first ball, steps away, goes to slap it miles but gets it straight up in the air and it's taken at extra cover. Can't blame Cummins for trying but didn't get this at all after giving himself room, straight up of a big top edge and extra cover took it simply on the edge of the circle
full and well wide, missed on the drive
back of a length and pulled to deep square leg, well struck but finds the man
around the wicket, angled in, played half-forward and gets an inside edge from off stump down to long leg
length outside off, angled down to third man
length ball, strikes the pad, they go for the run as the ball runs back up the wicket
bumper, Hogg steps away, bowler follows him and ducks and falls over
leg stump, turned into midwicket, two as the deep midwicket has to come a long way in
back of a length down the leg side
dabbed into the gully from outside off, slip goes across to field, a stupid throw at the non-striker's end brings two
full on leg stump, flicked down to long on
goes down the wicket, misses with a cut, the keeper whips off the bails, did Hogg get back? No he did not, sharp work from the keeper, had the bails off in a flash and Hogg didn't get back in time
back to a wrong'un, defends it on the crease
goes for a reverse sweep from outside leg stump, struck on the pad
cut into the covers where there's a misfield so they take two
goes for the reverse sweep again, this time off the stumps, misses again and the turn takes it past off stump
floated up and lifted over mid off, fine strike this is, timed really well, gave himself room and struck through the line
full just outside off, slapped down to long on
bumper, good line, ducked under
goes to play to leg, comes off the pad into the gully, slip fields again, and again the silly throw gives away an overthrow, in fact two of them
swing and miss, bowled him and it's all over. A length ball, clips the off bail, perfect delivery to end the game, aimed for the leg side and was a long way off
